articles.description: We've told you all pandemic about hospitals and medical workers around the country pushed to their limits in the battle against COVID-19. Just this week in Montana, Kalispell Regional Healthcare is down more than 100 workers from positive cases and quarantine…

articles.author: Megan McNeil
articles.title: Tucson woman loses dad to COVID-19, asks people to wear masks - KOLD
articles.description: A couple of weeks ago, her dad came down with a 103 degree fever, high blood pressure and couldn’t eat. He tested positive for COVID-19
articles.content:
TUCSON, Ariz. (KOLD News 13) -According to AZDHS, 6588 people in Arizona have lost their lives to COVID-19 since the pandemic started.
I think my dad meant fun, said Kara Vatthauer.

articles.title: COVID-19 case level at Pa. prison has nearly doubled in 3 days - PennLive

articles.content:
